componentID.description: common component identifying information, such as mpn

vinTyp.description: typical input voltage under which a device can be expected to operate without output dropping

vinMin.description: minimum input voltage under which a device can be expected to operate without output dropping

vinMax.description: maximum input voltage under which a device can be expected to operate without output dropping

voutTyp.description: typical output voltage a device can regulate

voutMin.description: minimum output voltage a device can regulate

voutMax.description: maximum output voltage a device can regulate

feedbackVoltageTyp.description: typical voltage comparison point at the feedback node

feedbackVoltageMax.description: max voltage comparison point at the feedback node

feedbackVoltageMin.description: minimum voltage comparison point at the feedback node

loadCurrentTyp.description: typical load current supported by a device

loadCurrentMax.description: maximum load current supported by a device

loadCurrentMin.description: minimum load current supported by a device

voutAccuracyTyp.description: typical output voltage variation at no load

voutAccuracyMax.description: maximum output voltage variation at no load

voutAccuracyMin.description: minimum output voltage variation at no load

loadRegulationTyp.description: typical output voltage variation from no load to full load

loadRegulationMax.description: maximum output voltage variation from no load to full load

loadRegulationMin.description: minimum output voltage variation from no load to full load

lineRegulationTyp.description: typical output voltage variation from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage

lineRegulationMax.description: maximum output voltage variation from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage

lineRegulationMin.description: minimum output voltage variation from minimum input voltage to maximum input voltage

enableTimeTyp.description: typical time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

enableTimeMax.description: max time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

enableTimeMin.description: minimum time between enable asserted and output voltage rising to 10% nominal

rampTimeTyp.description: typical time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

rampTimeMax.description: maximum time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

rampTimeMin.description: minimum time for output voltage to go from 10% vout nominal to 90% vout nominal

integratedFets.description: whether the regulator contains integrated switching mosfets

integratedFetProperties.description: describes integrated fet current limits and rdson properties
